name: space-bazaar

scripts.git-commit-push: git diff-index --quiet HEAD || (git add . && git commit -m "Something just got updated!" && git push origin main)
scripts.git-commit-push-force: git add . && git commit -m "Something just got updated!" --no-verify && git push origin main --force

description: Welcome to Space Bazaar, the ultimate marketplace for SpaceX enthusiasts and space exploration supporters! At Space Bazaar, users can buy, sell, and trade authentic SpaceX merchandise, from apparel and collectibles to exclusive mission-themed items. But it's more than just a marketplaceâ€”it's a movement.
author: Agbaka Daniel ugonna
